sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog v-model="dialogDelete" max-width="500px">
        <v-card>
            <v-card-title class="text-h5">Хотите удалить заявку?</v-card-title>
            <v-card-actions>
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="closeDelete">Отмена</v-btn>
                <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="deleteItemConfirm">Да</v-btn>
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>

export default {
    props: {
        dialogDelete: Boolean,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            localDialogDelete: false, // Используем локальную переменную
        };
    },
    watch: {
        dialogDelete(newValue) {
            this.localDialogDelete = newValue;
        },
        localDialogDelete(newValue) {
            this.$emit('update:dialogDelete', newValue);
        }
    },
    methods: {
        closeDelete() {
            this.localDialogDelete = false;
            this.$emit('close-delete');
        },
        deleteItemConfirm() {
            this.$emit('confirm-delete');
            this.localDialogDelete = false; // Мутируем локальную переменную
        },
    },
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
